description: The JOBY GorillaPod is the lightest and most versatile camera tripod available today. Featuring over two dozen flexible leg joints that bend and rotate, the GorillaPod will firmly secure your compact digital camera (up to 325g / 11.5 oz) to virtually any surface. Lightweight and portable, the GorillaPod is the ideal camera accessory for photographers on-the-go. Wrap it around a tree or perch it on a rock; the GorillaPod can handle just about any environment!"
title: Joby JB01237-CAM GorillaPod Original Tripod (Black/Lime Green)
